alert.note: Alert for Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 5:47PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Collier and northern Mainland Monroe Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 547 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wilderness Waterway, or 19 miles southeast of Chokoloskee, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Loop Road Ee Center and Big Cypress National Preserve. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe
